revision.comment: /* Recognition */ The source is a press release
revision.text:
{{Infobox Company |company_name = Privacy Analytics Incorporated |company_type = Private |foundation = 2007 |logo= [[File:Privacy Analytics.jpg]] |location = [[Ottawa, Ontario]] [[Canada]] |industry = Privacy enhancing technologies, analytics solutions |products = PARAT, De-identification consulting |homepage = {{URL|www.privacyanalytics.ca}} }}
'''Privacy Analytics Inc.''' is a Canadian technology firm that claims to offer the only commercially available integrated [[data masking]] and [[de-identification]] product on the market today.<ref name="Forbes1" /> Its products and services are used by hospitals and other health providers, universities and research groups, public health programs, registries, HMOs, pharmaceutical companies, insurance claims processors, and health information technology vendors.
==History==
Privacy Analytics, Inc. is a 2007 [[spin-out|spin-off]] from the [[Electronic Health Information Laboratory]], a collection of active academic authors working in the area of [[Privacy for research participants#Privacy attacks|health data risk mitigation]] and [[de-identification]]. It is headquartered in [[Ottawa]], [[Ontario]] with a secondary office in [[Toronto]].<ref>[http://www.privacyanalytics.ca PrivacyAnalytics.ca]</ref> ==Leadership==
*'''[[Khaled El Emam]]''' is the founder and [[Chief Executive Officer]] of Privacy Analytics *'''[[Sheldon Stevens]]''' is the [[Chief Financial Officer]] of Privacy Analytics
==Products==
* '''PARAT for Structured Data''' PARAT for [[structured data]] is a software tool that de-identifies data based on maximizing [[Granularity#Data_granularity|data granularity]] while still protecting subject privacy. * '''Privacy Analytics Risk Assessment Wizard''' A software product to conduct [[risk assessment]]s of internal data users or external data recipients. * '''Privacy Analytics Attack Simulator''' A tool to do [[sensitivity analysis|sensitivity analyses]] of structured data.
==Clients==
* Heritage Provider Network * BORN Ontario * Ontario Institute for Cancer Research and Cancer Care Ontario * Children's Hospital of Eastern Ontario * Canadian Primary Care Sentinel Surveillance Network
==Recognition==
* 2012 Strata + Hadoop World Start Up Winner<ref name=Forbes1>[http://www.forbes.com/sites/gilpress/2012/10/25/and-the-big-data-winners-are-privacy-analytics-placed-and-hadapt/ And the Big Data Winners Are... Privacy Analytics, Placed, and Hadapt]</ref> * World Summit on Innovation and Entrepeneurship "Global Hot 100 Enterprise"<ref>[http://www.prlog.org/11937182-privacy-analytics-named-global-hot-100-vendor-at-world-summit-for-innovation-entrepreneurship.html Privacy Analytics Named a Global Hot 100 Vendor at World Summit for Innovation & Entrepreneurship]</ref>{{Primary source-inline|date=June 2013}} * Gartner "Big Data Cool Vendor in Risk Management, Privacy and Compliance"<ref>[http://www.prlog.org/11871695-privacy-analytics-included-cool-vendors-in-risk-management-privacy-and-compliance-2012-report.html Privacy Analytics Included "Cool Vendors in Risk Management, Privacy and Compliance, 2012‚Äù Report]</ref>
